name: Enduring Might
text: When you gather your might, it lasts long enough to improve your defenses and attacks of opportunity.
prerequisites: Gather Might, gather power class feature, kineticist level 8th.
benefit: When you use Gather Might, the ability score bonuses last until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zh: 当你凝聚力量时，其持续时间足以加强你的防御能力和借机攻击。
prerequisites_zh: 凝聚力量，念力凝聚职业能力，操念使等级8。
benefit_zh: 当你使用凝聚力量时，该属性加值持续到你的下一回合开始。
